resources.string: Easily set-up your phone from your computer and Ready2Go will do the rest. Click \'Get Started\' to continue.

Ready2Go is a free service from AT&T that helps you to easily set-up and personalize your phone from the comfort of your web browser - no cables required. \n\nWith Ready2Go, it\'s easy to set-up your e-mail accounts, import your contacts, set your wallpaper, personalize your home screens, install free applications, set your ringtones, select bookmarks for your device web browser, and even configure your Wi-Fi.
Google\'s location server provides applications with your approximate location without using GPS. \n\nYou can disable these features in Settings, under Location & Security
Allow Google\'s location service to collect anonymous location data. Collection will occur even when no applications are running.
Go to the following URL on your computer to start configuring your phone.
Go to the following URL on your computer web browser to start personalizing your phone.
Go to the following link on your computer web browser to start personalizing your phone.
Ready2Go was unable to connect to your phone
Ready2Go requires a data connection to function. If you already have your SIM card in and have not yet established a data connection, then please try connecting to Wi-Fi.
I just finished the steps on the web and nothing happened on my phone
Completing the Ready2Go wizard on your computer web browser should automatically result in your configuration file being sent to your phone. If this did not occur, Click here to try again
I previously configured online and already have an email and password
Click here to login and download your settings.
Finish personalizing your phone on your computer, and as soon as you\'re done, your phone will automatically update with what you\'ve set-up online.
Already finished and this screen is not updating? Click here.
Your phone configuration is complete. Any applications you selected will download when you click Finish and will automatically install when complete.
Ready2Go was unable to establish a connection
You have no data connection. Please try again, or press cancel to quit Ready2Go.
Ready2Go was unable to connect to your phone
Please try again, or press cancel to quit Ready2Go.
Please try again, or press cancel to quit Ready2Go.
Ready2Go had a problem downloading your configuration
Please try again, or press cancel to quit Ready2Go.
This phone is different from the one you set up online

The settings you have configured online will not work on this phone.

We see your phone is a %1$s. Please visit Ready2Go and choose %1$s when selecting your device online.

Thank you. Please press Cancel to exit.
Enter the email address and password you used when completing Ready2Go on the web to download your personalized settings
Are you sure you want to stop all Application downloads?
Authentication is in progress, please wait...
Trying again to connect the server...
Click here to add or create an account
Click here to re-enter your credentials
This will complete the set-up process
Modify email, contacts, shortcuts and widgets
Allows the application to modify email, contacts, shortcuts, wallpapers, ringtones, notifications and installed widgets.
Allows the application to receive results about the configuration of Widgets, Shortcuts and Wallpapers
